quest.name: Get Along and Play Knife
journal:
You feel eyes upon you. And they're not just Jihli Aliapoh's.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

Jihli Aliapoh welcomes you to this most auspicious celebration of Hatching–tide, inspired by her annual prophetic dreams of the legendary Twelve Archons. She admits that this year's vision was rather peculiar because it featured tonberries, creatures of myth known less for their seasonal whimsy and more for their habit of mercilessly stabbing things. This dream proved prophetic indeed, when sylphs descended upon Gridania, dismantling decorations, harassing residents, and otherwise making a nuisance of themselves. These mischievous creatures are deathly afraid of the tonberries' wilting (yet adorable?) gaze, and with the help of a self-proclaimed tonberry connoisseur named Hamlyn, Jihli Aliapoh's volunteers have donned tonberry costumes to scare off the sylphs. They are shorthanded, however, and Hamlyn just so happens to have a costume in your size...

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

Hamlyn eagerly paws you into a tonberry guise and you set off to deter any rascally sylphs you might find. While this is not how you anticipated spending your Hatching–tide, you comfort yourself with the knowledge that you will be enjoying the festivities in no time.

※You must be wearing the tonberry guise to complete this task.
You successfully shoo away a bevy of troublemaking sylphs. Surely not even Hamlyn's uncomfortable heavy breathing will dampen your feeling of accomplishment...probably.

After pawing you out of the tonberry guise again, Hamlyn bids you share your report with Jihli. The eyes of his tonberry mask glint as he clutches your slightly sweaty costume in both hands. Best not to think too hard about it.

Jihli is delighted to hear that the sylphs' mischief has been thwarted and that festival preparations are once more proceeding apace, but Nonotta shatters this brief reprieve with panicked reports of mayhem in the Central Shroud. The caravan of Archon eggs─a most crucial decoration─has been beset upon by angry sylphs and the delivery mammet is malfunctioning in its attempt to prevent total highroad robbery. In this moment of distress, Hamlyn giggles his delight, as he claims to have a brilliant plan that is sure to save the day. You need only ask...
objectives: Shoo away sylphs while disguised as a tonberry.

dialogue.name: HAMLYN
dialogue.text: Heeeeee! Now's my chance! Now all shall know their splendor! <heavy breathing>

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Greetings, friend! And a happy Hatching–tide to you.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: May I say that you look eggsquisite as always, Forename? 'Tis always a pleasure.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Allow me to introduce myself─my name is Jihli Aliapoh, and I facilitate the annual Hatching–tide festivities.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: You are an adventurer, are you not? Might I ask for your name?

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Forename! 'Tis a pleasure to make your acquaintance.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: In case you are unaware, Hatching–tide festivities were conceived a number of years ago, after I was first visited by the Twelve Archons in a stirring and prophetic dream─and I confess, I've been dreaming ever since!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Oh, I am most eager to share my latest dream with you! It was...highly peculiar, to say the least. You see, I beheld visions of that chilling creature of legend─the tonberry!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: If past experience has taught me anything, it is that painstakingly recreating my dreams is sure to bring about good fortune. However, as tonberries are naught but figments of old fables, I began to doubt whether I could do justice to their ghastly appearance...

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: ...But that all changed when this gentleman generously offered his assistance!

dialogue.name: HAMLYN
dialogue.text: (-Hamlyn-)<snort> Greetings, miladyfine sir! My name is Hamlyn, and I am what you might call a supreme connoisseur and passionate aficionado of all things tonberry.

dialogue.name: HAMLYN
dialogue.text: (-Hamlyn-)As you may or may not be aware, tonberries have heads as round and adorable as any egg, which is why I believe they are the perfect addition to the Hatching–tide festivities. <snort> So I donned the superior mantle of tonberry, and presented myself to Miss Jihli here. Hee...

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: What luck, wouldn't you agree? Hamlyn was kind enough to furnish our other volunteers with tonberry guises, and we're all hard at work preparing for the upcoming fun.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: And a lot of eggy, stabby fun it shall be!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: ...Tonberries? Seriously?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: If you wanted real tonberries, I know a few in upper La Noscea...

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Exactly! That's the spirit of Hatching–tide. ...Perhaps without the “stabby” part.

dialogue.name: HAMLYN
dialogue.text: (-Hamlyn-)Such is often the reaction of the unenlightened, yes. But it only fuels the fire of my passion! <heavy breathing>

dialogue.name: HAMLYN
dialogue.text: (-Hamlyn-)You must be referring to those sightings near Bronze Lake. I wouldn't expect you to know this, but those creatures aren't true tonberries. They simply bear a vague resemblance to their descriptions in the old stories, and thus were nicknamed...thusly.

dialogue.name: HAMLYN
dialogue.text: (-Hamlyn-)No, the tonberries I speak of and adore above all else are the original and fictional creatures, spoken of in legend from time immemorial. <snort> Accept no substitutes!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Considering my dream, I think that these festivities present a unique opportunity to share the tonberries' charm with the world. There is but one problem.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: A group of sylphs has been making mischief throughout town. Playing pranks, sabotaging the decorations...

dialogue.name: HAMLYN
dialogue.text: (-Hamlyn-)Luckily, it seems a mere glance of the tonberry form is enough to send those leafy brigands fleeing in terror. Is it not remarkable how such an adorable visage can strike such fear into the hearts of some? Does not the contradiction of the tonberry's nature invigorate your very soul!? <heavy breathing>

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Our other volunteers are using their tonberry guises to shoo away the sylphs as best they can, but we still find ourselves shorthanded. Would you be willing to assist us, Forename? Just until the mischief is mitigated.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: My sincerest thanks. Hamlyn has prepared a plethora of guises for us, so I'm sure he will have one that fits you.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: It seems there's a trick to getting into that tonberry guise. I'm sure Hamlyn will be happy to assist!

dialogue.name: HAMLYN
dialogue.text: Now then, <snort> let us commence with this most sacred of ceremonies. Come closer... Hmhmhm...

dialogue.name: HAMLYN
dialogue.text: From the moment I saw you, I knew your small frame would lend itself perfectly to my creation. What an exquisite little tonberry you shall be! <shlorp>

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must continue wearing the tonberry guise in order to progress.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Speak with Hamlyn to restore or prolong the garment change.

dialogue.name: HAMLYN
dialogue.text: Hmm... Hold still─I must make some adjustments.

dialogue.name: HAMLYN
dialogue.text: Whatever is the matter? Was donning the holy guise of tonberry too euphoric? Too itchy? No matter─I shall adorn you once more. Heeeeeeeee!

dialogue.name: SYLPHB04721
dialogue.text: This one brims with delight! What a laugh these ones shall have!

dialogue.name: SYLPHE04721
dialogue.text: Tee hee! Walking ones will be ever so shocked!

dialogue.name: SYLPHA04721
dialogue.text: This one put a warty one behind those shiny eggs!

dialogue.name: SYLPHB04721
dialogue.text: Hee hee! Walking ones will dance and shriek!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must be wearing the tonberry guise provided by Hamlyn in order to progress.

dialogue.name: SYLPHA04721
dialogue.text: Hide well, warty one! Then spring out and make the walking ones screech and jump!

dialogue.name: SYLPHA04721
dialogue.text: Hee hee! This one can't wait!

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Let's have some eggy, eggy, stabby fun!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Did you just call me a warty one?

dialogue.name: SYLPHA04721
dialogue.text: Aaaiiieeeeee!

dialogue.name: SYLPHB04721
dialogue.text: Scary one! Scary one is here! Flee, flee!

dialogue.name: SYLPHC04721
dialogue.text: Not faaair! Those ones are having all the fun!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must be wearing the tonberry guise provided by Hamlyn in order to progress.

dialogue.name: SYLPHA04721
dialogue.text: Well, if these ones can't have fun with tusked ones, walking ones won't have any fun either! This one will make sure of it!

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: But how about some eggy, eggy, stabby fun?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: You can have fun with me!

dialogue.name: SYLPHC04721
dialogue.text: Hyaaaaaa! Monstrous one! This is why these ones need tusked oneees!

dialogue.name: SYLPHD04721
dialogue.text: B-But if elder one finds out...

dialogue.name: SYLPHE04721
dialogue.text: What elder one doesn't know won't hurt elder one! Don't be a wilting one.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must be wearing the tonberry guise provided by Hamlyn in order to progress.

dialogue.name: SYLPHD04721
dialogue.text: B-But...if these ones are naughty, elder one will become scolding one...

dialogue.name: SYLPHE04721
dialogue.text: No one will know it was these ones! Besides, it isn't that naughty... Hee hee!

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Don't be naughty─have eggy, eggy, stabby fun!

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: I think I'll be the judge of that.

dialogue.name: SYLPHD04721
dialogue.text: Gyaaaaaa! P-Please! Th-This one didn't mean any harm!

dialogue.name: SYLPHE04721
dialogue.text: Eeeeeek! Sticky one! Get it away!

dialogue.name: HAMLYN
dialogue.text: <snort> I trust you return from a job well done?

dialogue.name: HAMLYN
dialogue.text: I am sure Miss Jihli would like to hear the particulars. You may relay your report after I... <slurp> relieve you of that outfit. Hmhmhm...

dialogue.name: HAMLYN
dialogue.text: Well? Tell us─how did the tonberry fare? <heavy breathing>

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: I'm glad to hear those sylphs fluttered back home. Thank you for all of your help, Forename.

dialogue.name: HAMLYN
dialogue.text: Yes, you performed most admirably, not only in deed but in dress. Upon beholding a tonberry performing such selfless acts of valor, the citizens of Gridania are sure to have warmed to our adorable paragons of pointy justice─all according to <snort> plan.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Our other volunteers are currently making the rounds and checking the rest of the decorations for any residual surprises, but I daresay we should be able to officially begin the celebrations soon.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: All that's left is to wait for our Archon eggs to arrive from Ul'dah!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Which reminds me─Master Pawlin sends his regards. He is currently recovering from injuries sustained from a particularly sharp beak, and will therefore be unable to attend Hatching–tide this year...

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: ...But he generously sent us dozens and dozens of delightful eggs! So many, in fact, we had to commission the Goldsmiths' Guild for help with their decoration.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: I hope you enjoy the festivities! Something tells me this shall be a Hatching–tide to remember.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: (-Panicked Voice-)W-We have a problem!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Nonotta! Whatever is the matter?

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: It's the eggs, Jihli! The Archon eggs!

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Sylphs swarmed the shipment as it entered the Central Shroud and zapped the delivery mammet into a frenzy. The caravan has been brought to a complete standstill!

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: If only you had seen it─the chaos, the carnage, the eggs! Our beautiful Archon eggs scattered across the ground, sylphs pilfering them like spriggans, and that smoking mammet rampaging like an aldgoat possessed. 'Twas sheer mayhem, Jihli!

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: The sylphs presented no demands, offered no reason behind their rampant pillaging. But they did keep squeaking about “tusked ones” and “no fair” and “why should walking ones have all the fun?” What do you suppose they meant?

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Ah. I heard the sylphs once held an annual spring festival, but there was an incident involving one of their fighting boars... I believe that was the end of such festivities.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: I understand how it must pain them to see us cheerfully prepare for Hatching–tide, but those ill-gotten eggs won't ease their suffering. We must find a way to recover them...

dialogue.name: HAMLYN
dialogue.text: Heeeeee! If I may be so bold, <snort> I believe I have the perfect solution to your conundrum. Forename's assistance will be crucial, however. <heavy breathing> You will lend us your aid, yes?
